outputs.output_descr:
The project will assist with early recovery for shelters, livelihoods and education, targeting the most affected and vulnerable groups, including women-headed households and children. 

Expected Output 1: 250 families receive support to repair damaged or collapsed shelter. 
Target population: Worst affected households with damaged homes in the project area who do not qualify for government shelter support.

Expected Output 2: 1250 families recover through access to livelihoods support for replacement of productive assets and restarting food production. 
Target population: Affected households with increased vulnerability due to damage to crops and livelihoods, with priority to poor households, families with children under the age of 2, and families with pregnant women or lactating mothers.

Expected Output 3: 1,500 children recover through education kits to facilitate their return to school. 
Target population: Affected children from poor or low-income households in the project area.
outputs.output_title: Early Recovery in Ha Tinh and

project_descr: UNDP carry out a 6 month response to support an estimated 1,500 households in communities worst affected by the October floods in Quang Binh and Ha Tinh provinces.
project_title: Early Recovery in Ha Tinh and Quang Binh - 2010
